11a39ecf05362437a5288584c989de813b0b1082.query:
INSERT INTO match
                (team_one_id, team_two_id, start_date, winner_points, guess_points, room_id)
            VALUES
                (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

            SELECT
                match.id,
                team1.name AS team_one,
                team2.name AS team_two,
                match.start_date AS "start_date: _",
                match.winner_points,
                match.guess_points
            FROM
                match
                JOIN team as team1 on match.team_one_id = team1.id
                JOIN team as team2 on match.team_two_id = team2.id
            WHERE
                match.rowid = last_insert_rowid();

1e279004f86926a38ea23ed74cbfd01dfbdfe26e.query:
INSERT INTO user 
                (username, email, password)
            VALUES
                (?, ?, ?)

1eab4a6c5f8e797aa4c07e2b7db14ed45aa6bd8c.query:
UPDATE bet SET
                team_one_score = ?, 
                team_two_score = ?
            WHERE
                user_id = ?
                AND match_id = ?;

            SELECT
                match_id,
                user_id,
                team_one_score,
                team_two_score
            FROM
                bet
            WHERE
                user_id = ?
                AND match_id = ?;

4904a7779862e7c03ea3b70dcf646ddec5a048c5.query:
INSERT INTO bet
                (match_id, user_id, team_one_score, team_two_score)
            VALUES
                (?, ?, ?, ?);

            SELECT
                match_id,
                user_id,
                team_one_score,
                team_two_score
            FROM
                bet
            WHERE
                rowid = last_insert_rowid();

50323764f2bafbdfbb17a8cb87d699bcbb2052a8.query:
UPDATE
                room
            SET
                deleted_date = ?,
                deleted_by = ?
            WHERE
                id = ?;

53e93cea52ea9c16a0566846bebbdd4c803e765d.query:
INSERT INTO room
                (name, description, owner_id)
            VALUES
                (?, ?, ?);

            SELECT
                id,
                name,
                description,
                owner_id
            FROM
                room
            WHERE
                rowid = last_insert_rowid()

582c921a1fc76c3bcd3dfabebc720ad1ce200cf2.query:
DELETE FROM 
                match
            WHERE
                id = ?
                AND EXISTS ( 
                    SELECT
                        *
                    FROM 
                        match
                        JOIN room ON match.room_id = room.id
                    WHERE
                        room.owner_id = ?
                        AND match.id = ?
                    );

58e310bb88841e532b0b3f854c65d1c65a2425db.query:
SELECT
                match.id
            FROM
                match
                JOIN room on match.room_id = room.id
                LEFT JOIN room_user on room.id = room_user.room_id
            WHERE
                match.id = ?
                AND (
                    room.owner_id = ?
                    OR room_user.user_id = ?
                );

7da169952c405021bb24d2bbf3d1eb893c7cfec2.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
                room.id,
                room.name,
                room.description,
                room.owner_id
            FROM
                room 
                LEFT JOIN room_user ON room.id = room_user.room_id
            WHERE
                room.deleted_date IS NULL
                AND (
                    room_user.user_id = ?
                    OR room.owner_id = ?
                )

87d0494b293707f074766d3223475d1a36063f72.query:
SELECT
                id,
                name
            FROM
                team
            ORDER BY
                2

9d63aa1bbf03fe604baf28a4061d2361e0d290ee.query:
SELECT 
                CASE WHEN EXISTS (
                    SELECT 
                        * 
                    FROM 
                        user 
                    WHERE 
                        email = ?
                ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 end email_exists, 
                CASE WHEN EXISTS (
                    SELECT 
                        * 
                    FROM 
                        user 
                    WHERE 
                        username = ?
                ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 end username_exists

b116c15ad5e45329e97890d62ef3585dc8a7b86d.query:
SELECT
                match_id,
                user_id,
                team_one_score,
                team_two_score
            FROM
                bet
            WHERE
                user_id = ?
                AND match_id = ?;

b98e8182747151b7e104969a62d9b15e2d294d3d.query:
SELECT CASE 
                WHEN EXISTS (SELECT *
                            FROM
                                room 
                                JOIN room_user ON room.id = room_user.room_id
                            WHERE
                                room.id = ?
                                AND (room_user.user_id = ?
                                    OR room.owner_id = ?))
                    THEN 1
                ELSE 0
            END present

bea85bc3ad9708cac6c39692eabedf09fdc381fd.query:
SELECT
                id,
                username,
                email,
                password
            FROM
                user
            WHERE
                LOWER(email) = ?

c68e715db9535edc195f7309737b238f7c7e3d01.query:
INSERT INTO result
                (match_id, team_one_score, team_two_score)
            VALUES
                (?, ?, ?);

            SELECT
                match_id,
                team_one_score,
                team_two_score
            FROM
                result
            WHERE
                match_id = ?;

f12931a9bfa739257b25c361c141779d35366b82.query:
SELECT
                id,
                name,
                description,
                owner_id
            FROM
                room
            WHERE
                id = ?
                AND deleted_date IS NULL

f31eb7dddd4ae3f6a35ac7f859ca1d299df2a221.query:
UPDATE match SET 
                team_one_id = ?, 
                team_two_id = ?, 
                start_date = ?, 
                winner_points = ?, 
                guess_points = ?
            WHERE   
                id = ?;

            SELECT
                match.id,
                team1.name AS team_one,
                team2.name AS team_two,
                match.start_date AS "start_date: _",
                match.winner_points,
                match.guess_points
            FROM
                match
                JOIN team as team1 on match.team_one_id = team1.id
                JOIN team as team2 on match.team_two_id = team2.id
            WHERE
                match.id = ?;

fd42fc45c8f5139bf8789f800f71fe5c3645ad1a.query:
SELECT
                user.username AS username,
                t1.name AS team_one,
                t2.name AS team_two,
                bet.team_one_score AS team_one_score,
                bet.team_two_score AS team_two_score
            FROM
                bet
                JOIN user ON bet.user_id = user.id 
                JOIN match ON bet.match_id = match.id
                JOIN team t1 ON match.team_one_id = t1.id
                JOIN team t2 ON match.team_two_id = t2.id
            WHERE
                bet.match_id = ?;
